definition[0]: to make a mistake, or to force someone to make a mistake by tricking them
example[0]: On his latest album, Kowalski trips up attempting more modern songs.
example[1]: an attempt to trip up the prime minister on policy issues
definition[1]: to hit something with your foot so that you fall, or to make someone do this
example[2]: He chased the thief, tripped him up, and grabbed the camera.
